title: serverConfig
description: A remote server where files can be mirrored

serverName.description: The unique name that identifies this server configuration

user.description: The user name on the remote server

host.description: The host name or address of the remote server

publicKey.description: The public key file to use for key-based ssh authentication

privateKey.description: The private key file to use for key-based ssh authentication

password.description: The password to use for key-based ssh authentication (WARNING: NOT RECOMMENDED)
